perturbation.original_text:
F.
“Licensed Products” shall mean BlackMP Living Water, BlackMP Concentrate, Zezel Probiotic Water, Zayin Sports
Water, Gridiron CBD H2O Probiotics™ Water, Gridiron MVP™ and Gridiron MVP™ Concentrate using the Pro
Football Legends Logo on the Licensed Products’ affixed labels, hang-tags or packaging. Other products of the
Company may be added to the list of Licensed Products during the Contract Period by written amendment to this
Agreement. All amendments to this Agreement must be signed by all parties to this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
F.
“Licensed Products” shall mean BlackMP Living Water, BlackMP Concentrate, Zezel Probiotic Water, Zayin Sports
Water, Gridiron CBD H2O Probiotics™ Water, Gridiron MVP™ and Gridiron MVP™ Concentrate using the Pro
Football Legends Logo on the Licensed Products’ affixed labels, hang-tags or packaging. Other goods of the
Company may be added to the list of Commercial Products during the Contract Period by written amendment to this
Agreement. All amendments to this Agreement must be signed by all parties to this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Licensed Products' to 'Commercial Products' in the second sentence contradicts the defined term 'Licensed Products' established in the first sentence, creating confusion about which products are subject to the endorsement agreement.

perturbation.original_text:
C.
A *donation of $0.05 per Unit sold of Licensed Products within the Contract Territory payable to the **NFL Alumni
Northern California Chapter. Donated amounts will be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter
beginning on the first full quarter [three (3) month period] of the Agreement and continue on a quarterly basis
thereafter for the term of this Agreement. Where the following per Unit conversion shall apply for the term of this
Agreement:
perturbation.changed_text:
C.
A *donation of $0.05 per Unit sold of Endorsed Goods within the Contract Territory payable to the **NFL Alumni
Northern California Chapter. Donated amounts will be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter
beginning on the first full quarter [three (3) month period] of the Agreement and continue on a quarterly basis
thereafter for the term of this Agreement. Where the following per Unit conversion shall apply for the term of this
Agreement:
perturbation.explanation: Replacing 'Licensed Products' with 'Endorsed Goods' introduces ambiguity. 'Licensed Products' is a defined term, while 'Endorsed Goods' is not. This raises questions about whether the donation applies to a broader or different range of products than initially intended.

perturbation.original_text:
The Company will provide to the NFLA-NC upon request the most recent quarterly sales report of the Company’s
Licensed Products.
perturbation.changed_text:
The Corporation will provide to the NFLA-NC upon request the most recent quarterly sales report of the Corporation's
Approved Merchandise.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Company' to 'Corporation' and 'Licensed Products' to 'Approved Merchandise' introduces uncertainty. 'Company' is defined earlier, while 'Corporation' is similar but not identical. Also, 'Approved Merchandise' is not defined, potentially excluding products initially intended to be covered by the sales report.
